name: Neverending Hallways
description:
WASD-Move

MOUSE-Look

HOLD MOUSE-Run

F-Flashlight

This game is basically a trailer for my new game, Feed Me. It's not that long, only like- two minutes.

Also, I updated the collision detection system to where if you're on a wall, Adam will stop instead of walk in place. Also added a background so it's easier to tell when you are moving.

This game was made back in November of 2020. I only posted it here as an archive, cause why not :P
